pages.text: An $(l)arrow$() serves as ammunition for $(l:combat/bow)bows$(), $(l:combat/crossbow)crossbows$(), and dispensers. Arrows can be modified to imbue status effects on players and mobs.

pages.title: Take Aim
pages.text: Shoot something with an $(l:combat/arrow)arrow$(). $(br2)Using a $(l)bow$() or a $(l:combat/crossbow)crossbow$(), shoot an entity with an arrow, tipped arrow, or spectral arrow.
